content: Note that if you try to press your attack while he's in an idle or defensive posture, he'll eventually deflect your combo with a louder block noise, and then retaliate -- but you can beat him at his own game by deflecting after his deflection.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-White.md', within the main section titled 'Non-White', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Non-White' and the sub-subsection 'Non-White Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Note that if you try to press your attack while he's in an idle or defensive posture, he'll eventually deflect your combo with a louder block noise, and then retaliate -- but you can beat him at his own game by deflecting after his deflection.
